      • getMainMove

        public PlayerMessage getMainMove(java.lang.String s)
        Checks if the string inserted by the player is acceptable and generates either a playerMessageDie, a playerMessageToolCard, player playerMessageEndTurn. If the move is not correct, it generates a playerMessage with clientId as -1
        Specified by:
        getMainMove in class ViewClientConsolePrint
        Parameters:
        s - string inserted by the player
        Returns:
        playerMessage if the move was correct otherwise a playerMessage with clientId as -1
